filter_placeholder_tooltip: Filter by ROM or game name
show_missing_button_tooltip: Show only games with missing media
clear_selection_button_tooltip: Deselect all games in the table
refresh_button_tooltip: Reload the entire game list from the server
media_toggle_tooltip: Enable or disable scraping for this media type.
toggle_view_tooltip: Switch between media view and filename view
scrape_button_tooltip: Start scraping for all selected games
stop_button_tooltip: Immediately stop the current scraping process
deep_scrape_button_tooltip: Open a detailed view for a single selected game to correct it
force_redownload_button_tooltip: Force re-download of media files even if they already exist
force_metadata_button_tooltip: Force update of game metadata (name, description, etc.)
clean_paths_button_tooltip: Remove stock media paths on scrape
save_check_login_button_tooltip: Save all settings above and verify credentials with Screenscraper.fr
log_saving_and_testing: [SETTINGS] Saving credentials and performing login test...
editable_rom_name_placeholder: Edit name for better search results...
fetch_preview_button_tooltip: Search Screenscraper.fr with the settings above and show a preview
confirm_save_button_tooltip: Save the selected media to your library and update gamelist.xml
back_to_dashboard_button_tooltip: Return to the main dashboard and discard temporary changes
back_to_scraper_tooltip: Return to the main scraper dashboard
create_backup_desc: Enter an optional name for the backup. If left empty, a timestamp will be used.
create_backup_tooltip: Creates a backup of all gamelist.xml files
restore_button_tooltip: Open a dialog to restore systems from this backup
restore_modal_desc: Select the systems you want to restore from this backup.
cancel_button_tooltip: Closes this window without making changes
confirm_restore_tooltip: Restores the gamelist.xml for the selected systems
source_for_image_tooltip: Select the media type to use for the 'Image' column (e.g., Screenshot or Boxart).
source_for_box_tooltip: Select the media type to use for the 'Box' column (e.g., 2D or 3D Boxart).
strategy_for_image_tooltip: Choose how to select the 'Image' file if multiple are available.
strategy_for_video_tooltip: Choose how to select the 'Video' file if multiple are available.
strategy_for_marquee_tooltip: Choose how to select the 'Logo' file if multiple are available.
strategy_for_thumbnail_tooltip: Choose how to select the 'Box' file if multiple are available.
save_in_rom_dir_tooltip: If enabled, media will be saved in a subfolder next to each ROM file.
media_dir_name_tooltip: Define the name for the media subfolder (e.g., 'images').
save_changes_button_tooltip: Save all advanced settings and return to the dashboard.
ai_instructions_text: To enable the AI name guesser, you need a free API key from Google AI Studio. No credit card is required. Get one here: https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey
api_key_tooltip: Enter your free API key from Google AI Studio here.
test_key_button_tooltip: Sends a simple test request to the Gemini API to verify the key.
log_key_missing: Please enter an API key to test.
